content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":599200,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cf36473c-9ccd-47d6-ad2b-a413cc12039b/10808.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cf36473c-9ccd-47d6-ad2b-a413cc12039b/10808.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"10808.jpg\",\"name\":\"10808.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"cf36473c-9ccd-47d6-ad2b-a413cc12039b\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":637,\"height\":190},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WELCOME TO OPERATIONS TEAM!  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are extremely happy you have joined us!  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hope that you will unlock your potential and enjoy working with us. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our warmest congratulations and best wishes for your further development. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
